verses.arabic: الٓر ۚ كِتَـٰبٌ أُحْكِمَتْ ءَايَـٰتُهُۥ ثُمَّ فُصِّلَتْ مِن لَّدُنْ حَكِيمٍ خَبِيرٍ
verses.english: Alif, Lam, Ra. [This is] a Book whose verses are perfected and then presented in detail from [one who is] Wise and Acquainted.
verses.hausa: A. L̃.R. Littãfi ne an kyautata ãyõyinsa, sa'an nan an bayyanã su daki-daki, daga wurin Mai hikima, Mai ƙididdigewa.

verses.arabic: أَلَّا تَعْبُدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّنِى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ وَبَشِيرٌ
verses.english: [Through a messenger, saying], "Do not worship except Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a warner and a bringer of good tidings,"
verses.hausa: Kada ku bautã wa kõwa fãce Allah. Lalle ne ni a gare ku mai gargaɗi ne kuma mai bushãrã daga gare Shi.

verses.arabic: وَأَنِ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ يُمَتِّعْكُم مَّتَـٰعًا حَسَنًا إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى وَيُؤْتِ كُلَّ ذِى فَضْلٍ فَضْلَهُۥ ۖ وَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَإِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ كَبِيرٍ
verses.english: And [saying], "Seek forgiveness of your Lord and repent to Him, [and] He will let you enjoy a good provision for a specified term and give every doer of favor his favor. But if you turn away, then indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a great Day.
verses.hausa: Kuma ku nẽmi gãfara gun Ubangijinku. Sa'an nan ku tũba zuwa gare Shi, Ya jiyar da ku dãɗi, jiyarwa mai kyau zuwa ga ajali ambatacce, kuma Ya bai wa dukkan ma'abucin, girma girmansa. Amma idan kun jũya, to, lalle nĩ, inã tsõron azãbar yini mai girma a kanku.

verses.arabic: إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَرْجِعُكُمْ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.english: To Allah is your return, and He is over all things competent."
verses.hausa: Zuwa ga Allah makõmarku take, kuma Shĩ a kan kõmeMai ĩkon yi ne.

verses.arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمْ يَثْنُونَ صُدُورَهُمْ لِيَسْتَخْفُوا۟ مِنْهُ ۚ أَلَا حِينَ يَسْتَغْشُونَ ثِيَابَهُمْ يَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
verses.english: Unquestionably, they the disbelievers turn away their breasts to hide themselves from Him. Unquestionably, [even] when they cover themselves in their clothing, Allah knows what they conceal and what they declare. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.
verses.hausa: To, lalle sũ sunã karkatar da ƙirjinsu dõmin su ɓõye daga gare shi. To, a lõkacin da suke lulluɓẽwa da tufãfinsu Yanã sanin abin da suke ɓoyewa da abin da suke bayyanãwa. Lalle Shi Masani ne ga abin da yake a cikin ƙirãzã.

verses.arabic: وَمَا مِن دَآبَّةٍ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ رِزْقُهَا وَيَعْلَمُ مُسْتَقَرَّهَا وَمُسْتَوْدَعَهَا ۚ كُلٌّ فِى كِتَـٰبٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.english: And there is no creature on earth but that upon Allah is its provision, and He knows its place of dwelling and place of storage. All is in a clear register.
verses.hausa: Kuma bãbu wata dabba a cikin ƙasa fãce ga Allah arzikinta yake, kuma Yanã sanin matabbatarta da ma'azarta, duka sunã cikin littãfi bayyananne.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَكَانَ عَرْشُهُۥ عَلَى ٱلْمَآءِ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا ۗ وَلَئِن قُلْتَ إِنَّكُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ٱلْمَوْتِ لَيَقُولَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.english: And it is He who created the heavens and the earth in six days - and His Throne had been upon water - that He might test you as to which of you is best in deed. But if you say, "Indeed, you are resurrected after death," those who disbelieve will surely say, "This is not but obvious magic."
verses.hausa: Kuma shi ne wanda Ya halicci sammai da ƙasa a cikin kwanaki shida, kuma Al'arshinSa ya kasance akan ruwa, dõmin Ya jarrabã ku, wannan ne daga cikinku mafi kyãwon aiki. Kuma haƙĩƙa idan ka ce: "Lalle kũ waɗanda ake tãyarwa ne a bãyan mutuwa," haƙĩƙa waɗanda suka kãfirta sunã cẽwa: "Wannan bai zama ba fãce sihiri bayyananne."

verses.arabic: وَلَئِنْ أَخَّرْنَا عَنْهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابَ إِلَىٰٓ أُمَّةٍ مَّعْدُودَةٍ لَّيَقُولُنَّ مَا يَحْبِسُهُۥٓ ۗ أَلَا يَوْمَ يَأْتِيهِمْ لَيْسَ مَصْرُوفًا عَنْهُمْ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.english: And if We hold back from them the punishment for a limited time, they will surely say, "What detains it?" Unquestionably, on the Day it comes to them, it will not be averted from them, and they will be enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne idan Mun jinkirta da azãba gare su zuwa ga wani lõkaci ƙidãyayye, haƙĩƙa sunãcẽwa me yake tsare ta? To, a rãnar da zã ta je musu, ba ta zama abin karkatarwa ba daga gare su. Kuma abin da suka kasance suna yin izgili da shi, yã wajaba a kansu.

verses.arabic: وَلَئِنْ أَذَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِنَّا رَحْمَةً ثُمَّ نَزَعْنَـٰهَا مِنْهُ إِنَّهُۥ لَيَـُٔوسٌ كَفُورٌ
verses.english: And if We give man a taste of mercy from Us and then We withdraw it from him, indeed, he is despairing and ungrateful.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne idan Mun ɗanɗana wa mutum wata rahama daga gare Mu, sa'an nan kuma Muka zãre ta daga gare shi, lalle ne shĩ, hakĩka, mai yanke tsammãnine, mai yawan kãfrci.

verses.arabic: وَلَئِنْ أَذَقْنَـٰهُ نَعْمَآءَ بَعْدَ ضَرَّآءَ مَسَّتْهُ لَيَقُولَنَّ ذَهَبَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتُ عَنِّىٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَفَرِحٌ فَخُورٌ
verses.english: But if We give him a taste of favor after hardship has touched him, he will surely say, "Bad times have left me." Indeed, he is exultant and boastful -
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne idan Mun ɗanɗana masa ni'ima a bãyan cũta ta shãfe shi, Yana cẽwa mũnanan halaye sun tafi daga wurina. Lalle shi mai farin ciki ne, mai alfahari.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ
verses.english: Except for those who are patient and do righteous deeds; those will have forgiveness and great reward.
verses.hausa: Sai waɗanda suka yi haƙuri kuma suka aikata ayyuka na ƙwarai. Waɗannan sunã da gãfara da lãda mai girma.

verses.arabic: فَلَعَلَّكَ تَارِكٌۢ بَعْضَ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيْكَ وَضَآئِقٌۢ بِهِۦ صَدْرُكَ أَن يَقُولُوا۟ لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ كَنزٌ أَوْ جَآءَ مَعَهُۥ مَلَكٌ ۚ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ نَذِيرٌ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَكِيلٌ
verses.english: Then would you possibly leave [out] some of what is revealed to you, or is your breast constrained by it because they say, "Why has there not been sent down to him a treasure or come with him an angel?" But you are only a warner. And Allah is Disposer of all things.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka tsammãninka kai mai barin sãshen abin da aka yi wahayi zuwa gare ka ne, kuma mai ƙuntata ƙirjinka da shi ne dõmin sun ce: "Dõmin me ba a saukar masa da wata taska ba, kõ kuma Malã'ika ya zo tãre de shi?" Kai mai gargaɗi ne kawai. Kuma Allah ne wakili a kan kõme.

verses.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ ٱفْتَرَىٰهُ ۖ قُلْ فَأْتُوا۟ بِعَشْرِ سُوَرٍ مِّثْلِهِۦ مُفْتَرَيَـٰتٍ وَٱدْعُوا۟ مَنِ ٱسْتَطَعْتُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.english: Or do they say, "He invented it"? Say, "Then bring ten surahs like it that have been invented and call upon [for assistance] whomever you can besides Allah, if you should be truthful."
verses.hausa: Kõ sunã cewa: "Yã ƙirƙira shi ne."Ka ce: "Sai ku zo da sũrõri gõma misãlinsa ƙirƙirarru, kuma ku kirãyi wanda kuke iyãwa, baicin Allah, idan kun kasance mãsu gaskiya."

verses.arabic: فَإِلَّمْ يَسْتَجِيبُوا۟ لَكُمْ فَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّمَآ أُنزِلَ بِعِلْمِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَن لَّآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ فَهَلْ أَنتُم مُّسْلِمُونَ
verses.english: And if they do not respond to you - then know that the Qur'an was revealed with the knowledge of Allah and that there is no deity except Him. Then, would you [not] be Muslims?
verses.hausa: To, idan ba su amsa muku ba, to, ku sani cẽwa an saukar da shi kawai ne da sanin Allah, kuma cẽwa bãbu abin bauta wa fãce Shi. To, shin, kũ mãsu sallamãwa ne?,

verses.arabic: مَن كَانَ يُرِيدُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَزِينَتَهَا نُوَفِّ إِلَيْهِمْ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ فِيهَا وَهُمْ فِيهَا لَا يُبْخَسُونَ
verses.english: Whoever desires the life of this world and its adornments - We fully repay them for their deeds therein, and they therein will not be deprived.
verses.hausa: Wanda ya kasance yã yi nufin rãyuwar dũniya da ƙawarta, Munã cika musu ayyukansu zuwa gare su a cikinta, kuma a cikinta bã zã a rage su ba.

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَيْسَ لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ إِلَّا ٱلنَّارُ ۖ وَحَبِطَ مَا صَنَعُوا۟ فِيهَا وَبَـٰطِلٌ مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: Those are the ones for whom there is not in the Hereafter but the Fire. And lost is what they did therein, and worthless is what they used to do.
verses.hausa: Waɗannan ne waɗanda bã su da kõme a cikin Lãhira fãce wuta, kuma abin da suka sanã'anta a cikinta (dũniya) yã ɓãci, kuma abin da suka kasance sunã aikatãwa ɓãtacce ne.

verses.arabic: أَفَمَن كَانَ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ وَيَتْلُوهُ شَاهِدٌ مِّنْهُ وَمِن قَبْلِهِۦ كِتَـٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِمَامًا وَرَحْمَةً ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يَكْفُرْ بِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلْأَحْزَابِ فَٱلنَّارُ مَوْعِدُهُۥ ۚ فَلَا تَكُ فِى مِرْيَةٍ مِّنْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ ٱلْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.english: So is one who [stands] upon a clear evidence from his Lord [like the aforementioned]? And a witness from Him follows it, and before it was the Scripture of Moses to lead and as mercy. Those [believers in the former revelations] believe in the Qur'an. But whoever disbelieves in it from the [various] factions - the Fire is his promised destination. So be not in doubt about it. Indeed, it is the truth from your Lord, but most of the people do not believe.
verses.hausa: Shin, wanda ya kasance a kan hujja bayyananna daga Ubangijinsa, kuma wata shaida tanã biyar sa daga gare Shi, kuma a gabãninsa akwai littãfin Mũsãabin kõyi da rahama? Waɗannan sunã yin ĩmãni da shi, kuma wanda ya kãfirta da shi daga ƙungiyõyi, to, wutã ce makõmarsa. Sabõda haka kada ka kasance a cikin shakka daga gare shi. Lalle shi ne gaskiya daga Ubangijinka, amma kuma mafi yawan mutãne bã su yin ĩmãni.

verses.arabic: وَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُعْرَضُونَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ وَيَقُولُ ٱلْأَشْهَـٰدُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَبُوا۟ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ ۚ أَلَا لَعْنَةُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَى ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: And who is more unjust than he who invents a lie about Allah? Those will be presented before their Lord, and the witnesses will say, "These are the ones who lied against their Lord." Unquestionably, the curse of Allah is upon the wrongdoers.
verses.hausa: Kuma wãne ne mafi zãlunci daga wanda ya ƙirƙira ƙarya ga Allah? Waɗannan anã gitta su ga Ubangijinsu, kuma mãsu shaida su ce: "Waɗannan ne suka yi ƙarya ga Ubangijinsu. To, la'anar Allah ta tabbata a kan azzãlumai."

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَبْغُونَهَا عِوَجًا وَهُم بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ هُمْ كَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.english: Who averted [people] from the way of Allah and sought to make it [seem] deviant while they, concerning the Hereafter, were disbelievers.
verses.hausa: Waɗanda suke kangẽwa daga hanyar Allah kuma sunã nẽman ta karkace, kuma sũ ga Lãhira sunã kãfirta.

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَمْ يَكُونُوا۟ مُعْجِزِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا كَانَ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِنْ أَوْلِيَآءَ ۘ يُضَـٰعَفُ لَهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ ۚ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَسْتَطِيعُونَ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.english: Those were not causing failure [to Allah] on earth, nor did they have besides Allah any protectors. For them the punishment will be multiplied. They were not able to hear, nor did they see.
verses.hausa: Waɗannan ne ba su kasance mabuwãya ba a cikin ƙasa, kuma waɗansu masõya ba su kasance ba a gare su, baicin Allah. Anã ninka musu azãba, ba su kasance sunã iya ji ba, kuma ba su kasance sunã gani ba.

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَضَلَّ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَفْتَرُونَ
verses.english: Those are the ones who will have lost themselves, and lost from them is what they used to invent.
verses.hausa: Waɗannan ne wɗanda suka yi hasãrar rãyukansu, kuma abin da suka kasance sunã ƙirƙirawa ya ɓace musu.

verses.arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمْ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلْأَخْسَرُونَ
verses.english: Assuredly, it is they in the Hereafter who will be the greatest losers.
verses.hausa: Bãbu makawã cẽwa, haƙĩƙa, sũ a lãhira, sũ ne mafi hasãra.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَأَخْبَتُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.english: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds and humbled themselves to their Lord - those are the companions of Paradise; they will abide eternally therein.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni kuma suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai, kuma suka yi tawãlu'i zuwa ga Ubangijinsu, waɗannan ne abõkan Aljanna, sunã madawwama a cikinta.

verses.arabic: مَثَلُ ٱلْفَرِيقَيْنِ كَٱلْأَعْمَىٰ وَٱلْأَصَمِّ وَٱلْبَصِيرِ وَٱلسَّمِيعِ ۚ هَلْ يَسْتَوِيَانِ مَثَلًا ۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.english: The example of the two parties is like the blind and deaf, and the seeing and hearing. Are they equal in comparison? Then, will you not remember?
verses.hausa: Misãlin ɓangaren biyu kamar makãho ne da kurmã, da mai gani da mai ji. Shin, sunã daidaita ga misãli? Ashe, bã ku yin tunãni?

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦٓ إِنِّى لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.english: And We had certainly sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Indeed, I am to you a clear warner
verses.hausa: Kuma haƙĩƙa Mun aika Nũhu zuwa ga mutanensa, (ya ce): "Lalle ne ni, a gare ku mai gargaɗi bayyananne ne."

verses.arabic: أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ ۖ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.english: That you not worship except Allah. Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a painful day."
verses.hausa: "Kada ku bautã wa kõwa fãce Allah. Lalle nĩ, inã jin tsõron azãbar yini mai raɗaɗi a kanku."

verses.arabic: فَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَوْمِهِۦ مَا نَرَىٰكَ إِلَّا بَشَرًا مِّثْلَنَا وَمَا نَرَىٰكَ ٱتَّبَعَكَ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ أَرَاذِلُنَا بَادِىَ ٱلرَّأْىِ وَمَا نَرَىٰ لَكُمْ عَلَيْنَا مِن فَضْلٍۭ بَلْ نَظُنُّكُمْ كَـٰذِبِينَ
verses.english: So the eminent among those who disbelieved from his people said, "We do not see you but as a man like ourselves, and we do not see you followed except by those who are the lowest of us [and] at first suggestion. And we do not see in you over us any merit; rather, we think you are liars."
verses.hausa: Sai mashãwarta waɗanda suka kãfirta, daga mutãnensa, suka ce: "Bã mu ganin ka fãce mutum kake kamarmu, kuma ba mu ganin wani ya bĩ ka fãce waɗanda suke sũ ƙasƙantattunmu ne marasa tunani. Kuma bã mu ganin wata falalã agare ka a kanmu. Ã'a, Munã zaton ku maƙaryata ne."

verses.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِن كُنتُ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّى وَءَاتَىٰنِى رَحْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِهِۦ فَعُمِّيَتْ عَلَيْكُمْ أَنُلْزِمُكُمُوهَا وَأَنتُمْ لَهَا كَـٰرِهُونَ
verses.english: He said, "O my people have you considered: if I should be upon clear evidence from my Lord while He has given me mercy from Himself but it has been made unapparent to you, should we force it upon you while you are averse to it?
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ya mutãnena! Shin, kun gani idan na kasance a kan wata hujja bayyananna daga Ubangijina, kuma Yã bã ni wata Rahama daga wurinSa, Sa'an nan aka rufe ta (ita Rahamar) daga gare ku, shin, zã mu tĩlasta mukuita, alhãli kuwa kũ mãsu ƙi gare ta ne?

verses.arabic: وَيَـٰقَوْمِ لَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مَالًا ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِطَارِدِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّهُم مُّلَـٰقُوا۟ رَبِّهِمْ وَلَـٰكِنِّىٓ أَرَىٰكُمْ قَوْمًا تَجْهَلُونَ
verses.english: And O my people, I ask not of you for it any wealth. My reward is not but from Allah. And I am not one to drive away those who have believed. Indeed, they will meet their Lord, but I see that you are a people behaving ignorantly.
verses.hausa: "Kuma yã mutãnena! Bã zan tambaye ku wata dũkiya ba akansa, ijãrata ba ta zama ba, fãce daga Allah, kuma ban zama mai kõrar waɗanda suka yĩ ĩmãni ba. Haƙĩƙa sũ, mãsu haɗuwa da Ubangijinsu ne, kuma amma ni, inã ganin ku mutãne ne jãhilai."

verses.arabic: وَيَـٰقَوْمِ مَن يَنصُرُنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِن طَرَدتُّهُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.english: And O my people, who would protect me from Allah if I drove them away? Then will you not be reminded?
verses.hausa: "Kuma ya mutãnena! Wãne ne yake taimakõna daga Allah idan na kõre su? Ashe, bã ku tunãni?"

verses.arabic: وَلَآ أَقُولُ لَكُمْ عِندِى خَزَآئِنُ ٱللَّهِ وَلَآ أَعْلَمُ ٱلْغَيْبَ وَلَآ أَقُولُ إِنِّى مَلَكٌ وَلَآ أَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ تَزْدَرِىٓ أَعْيُنُكُمْ لَن يُؤْتِيَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ خَيْرًا ۖ ٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا فِىٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ ۖ إِنِّىٓ إِذًا لَّمِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: And I do not tell you that I have the depositories [containing the provision] of Allah or that I know the unseen, nor do I tell you that I am an angel, nor do I say of those upon whom your eyes look down that Allah will never grant them any good. Allah is most knowing of what is within their souls. Indeed, I would then be among the wrongdoers."
verses.hausa: "Kuma bã ni ce muku a wurĩna taskõkin Allah suke kuma bã inã sanin gaibi ba ne. Kuma ba inã cẽwa ni Malã'ika ba ne. Kuma ba ni cẽwa ga waɗanda idãnunku suke wulãkantãwa, Allah bã zai bã su alhẽri ba. Allah ne Mafi sani ga abin da yake cikin zukatansu. Lalle ne ni, idan (nã yi haka) dã ina daga cikin azzalumai."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰنُوحُ قَدْ جَـٰدَلْتَنَا فَأَكْثَرْتَ جِدَٰلَنَا فَأْتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.english: They said, "O Noah, you have disputed us and been frequent in dispute of us. So bring us what you threaten us, if you should be of the truthful."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Yã Nũhu, lalle ne kã yi jayayya da mu, sa'an nan kã yawaita yi mana jidãli, to, ka zõ mana da abin da kake yi mana wa'adi idan kã kasance daga mãsu gaskiya."

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَا يَأْتِيكُم بِهِ ٱللَّهُ إِن شَآءَ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ
verses.english: He said, "Allah will only bring it to you if He wills, and you will not cause [Him] failure.
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Allah kawai ne Yake zo muku da shi idan Ya so. Kuma ba ku zama mabuwãya ba."

verses.arabic: وَلَا يَنفَعُكُمْ نُصْحِىٓ إِنْ أَرَدتُّ أَنْ أَنصَحَ لَكُمْ إِن كَانَ ٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ أَن يُغْوِيَكُمْ ۚ هُوَ رَبُّكُمْ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.english: And my advice will not benefit you - although I wished to advise you - If Allah should intend to put you in error. He is your Lord, and to Him you will be returned."
verses.hausa: "Kuma nasĩhãta bã zã ta amfãne ku ba, idan nã yi nufin in yi muku nasĩha, idan Allah Yakasance Yanã nufin Ya halaka ku. Shĩ ne Ubangijinku, kuma zuwa gare Shi ake mayar da ku."

verses.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ ٱفْتَرَىٰهُ ۖ قُلْ إِنِ ٱفْتَرَيْتُهُۥ فَعَلَىَّ إِجْرَامِى وَأَنَا۠ بَرِىٓءٌ مِّمَّا تُجْرِمُونَ
verses.english: Or do they say [about Prophet Muhammad], "He invented it"? Say, "If I have invented it, then upon me is [the consequence of] my crime; but I am innocent of what [crimes] you commit."
verses.hausa: Ko sunã cẽwa: (Nũhu) ya ƙirƙira shi. Ka ce: "Idan nĩ (Nũhu) na ƙirƙira shi to, laifĩnã a kaina yake, kuma nĩ mai barrantã ne daga abin da kuke yi na laifi."

verses.arabic: وَأُوحِىَ إِلَىٰ نُوحٍ أَنَّهُۥ لَن يُؤْمِنَ مِن قَوْمِكَ إِلَّا مَن قَدْ ءَامَنَ فَلَا تَبْتَئِسْ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.english: And it was revealed to Noah that, "No one will believe from your people except those who have already believed, so do not be distressed by what they have been doing.
verses.hausa: Kuma aka yi wahayi zuwa ga Nũhu cẽwa: Lalle ne bãbu mai yin ĩmãni daga mutãnenka fãce wanda ya riga ya yi ĩmãnin, sabõdahaka kada ka yi baƙin ciki da abin da suka kasance sunã aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: وَٱصْنَعِ ٱلْفُلْكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا وَوَحْيِنَا وَلَا تُخَـٰطِبْنِى فِى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّهُم مُّغْرَقُونَ
verses.english: And construct the ship under Our observation and Our inspiration and do not address Me concerning those who have wronged; indeed, they are [to be] drowned."
verses.hausa: Kuma ka sassaƙa jirgi da kyau a kan idanunMu da wahayinMu, kuma kada ka yi Mini magana a cikin sha'anin waɗanda suka kãfirta, lalle ne sũ, waɗanda akenutsarwa ne.

verses.arabic: وَيَصْنَعُ ٱلْفُلْكَ وَكُلَّمَا مَرَّ عَلَيْهِ مَلَأٌ مِّن قَوْمِهِۦ سَخِرُوا۟ مِنْهُ ۚ قَالَ إِن تَسْخَرُوا۟ مِنَّا فَإِنَّا نَسْخَرُ مِنكُمْ كَمَا تَسْخَرُونَ
verses.english: And he constructed the ship, and whenever an assembly of the eminent of his people passed by him, they ridiculed him. He said, "If you ridicule us, then we will ridicule you just as you ridicule.
verses.hausa: Kuma Yanã sassaƙa jirgin cikin natsuwa, kuma a kõ yaushe waɗansu shugabanni daga mutãnensa suka shũɗe a gabansa, sai su yi izgili gare shi. Ya ce: "Idan kun yi izgili gare mu, to, haƙĩƙa mũ mã zã mu yi izgili gare ku, kamar yadda kuke yin izgili.

verses.arabic: فَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ مَن يَأْتِيهِ عَذَابٌ يُخْزِيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيْهِ عَذَابٌ مُّقِيمٌ
verses.english: And you are going to know who will get a punishment that will disgrace him [on earth] and upon whom will descend an enduring punishment [in the Hereafter]."
verses.hausa: "Sa'an nan da sannu zã ku san wanda azãba zã ta zo masa, ta wulakantã shi (a dũniya), kuma wata azãba zaunanna ta sauka a kansa (a Lãhira)."

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَمْرُنَا وَفَارَ ٱلتَّنُّورُ قُلْنَا ٱحْمِلْ فِيهَا مِن كُلٍّ زَوْجَيْنِ ٱثْنَيْنِ وَأَهْلَكَ إِلَّا مَن سَبَقَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْقَوْلُ وَمَنْ ءَامَنَ ۚ وَمَآ ءَامَنَ مَعَهُۥٓ إِلَّا قَلِيلٌ
verses.english: [So it was], until when Our command came and the oven overflowed, We said, "Load upon the ship of each [creature] two mates and your family, except those about whom the word has preceded, and [include] whoever has believed." But none had believed with him, except a few.
verses.hausa: Har a lõkacin da umurninMu ya je, kuma tandã ta ɓulɓula. Muka ce: "Ka ɗauka, a cikinta, daga kõme, ma'aura biyu, da kuma iyalanka, fãce wanda magana ta gabãta a kansa, da wanda ya yi ĩmãni." Amma kuma bãbu waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni tãre da shi fãce kaɗan."

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱرْكَبُوا۟ فِيهَا بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ مَجْر۪ىٰهَا وَمُرْسَىٰهَآ ۚ إِنَّ رَبِّى لَغَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.english: And [Noah] said, "Embark therein; in the name of Allah is its course and its anchorage. Indeed, my Lord is Forgiving and Merciful."
verses.hausa: Kuma ya ce: "Ku hau a cikinta, da sũnan Allah magudãnarta da matabbatarta. Lalle ne Ubangijĩna, haƙĩƙa, Mai gãfara ne, Mai jin ƙai."

verses.arabic: وَهِىَ تَجْرِى بِهِمْ فِى مَوْجٍ كَٱلْجِبَالِ وَنَادَىٰ نُوحٌ ٱبْنَهُۥ وَكَانَ فِى مَعْزِلٍ يَـٰبُنَىَّ ٱرْكَب مَّعَنَا وَلَا تَكُن مَّعَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.english: And it sailed with them through waves like mountains, and Noah called to his son who was apart [from them], "O my son, come aboard with us and be not with the disbelievers."
verses.hausa: Kuma ita tanã gudãna da su a cikin tãguwar ruwa kamai duwãtsu, sai Nũhu ya kirãyi ɗansa alhãli, kuwa ya kasance can wuri mai nĩsa. "Yã ƙaramin ɗãnã! zo ka hau tãre da mu, kuma kada ka kasance tãre da kãfirai!"

verses.arabic: قَالَ سَـَٔاوِىٓ إِلَىٰ جَبَلٍ يَعْصِمُنِى مِنَ ٱلْمَآءِ ۚ قَالَ لَا عَاصِمَ ٱلْيَوْمَ مِنْ أَمْرِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ ۚ وَحَالَ بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلْمَوْجُ فَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُغْرَقِينَ
verses.english: [But] he said, "I will take refuge on a mountain to protect me from the water." [Noah] said, "There is no protector today from the decree of Allah, except for whom He gives mercy." And the waves came between them, and he was among the drowned.
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Zan tattara zuwa ga wani dũtse ya tsare ni daga ruwan." (Nũhu) ya ce: "Bãbu mai tsarẽwa a yau daga umurnin Allah fãce wanda Ya yi wa rahama." Sai taguwar ruwa ta shãmakace a tsakãninsu, sai ya kasance daga waɗanda aka nutsar.

verses.arabic: وَقِيلَ يَـٰٓأَرْضُ ٱبْلَعِى مَآءَكِ وَيَـٰسَمَآءُ أَقْلِعِى وَغِيضَ ٱلْمَآءُ وَقُضِىَ ٱلْأَمْرُ وَٱسْتَوَتْ عَلَى ٱلْجُودِىِّ ۖ وَقِيلَ بُعْدًا لِّلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: And it was said, "O earth, swallow your water, and O sky, withhold [your rain]." And the water subsided, and the matter was accomplished, and the ship came to rest on the [mountain of] Judiyy. And it was said, "Away with the wrongdoing people."
verses.hausa: Kuma aka ce: "Yã ƙasa! Ki haɗiye ruwanki, kuma yã sama! Ki kãme."Kuma aka faƙar da ruwan kuma aka hukunta al'amarin, kuma Jirgin ya daidaita a kan Jũdiyyi, kuma aka ce: "Nĩsa ya tabbata ga mutãne azzãlumai."

verses.arabic: وَنَادَىٰ نُوحٌ رَّبَّهُۥ فَقَالَ رَبِّ إِنَّ ٱبْنِى مِنْ أَهْلِى وَإِنَّ وَعْدَكَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَأَنتَ أَحْكَمُ ٱلْحَـٰكِمِينَ
verses.english: And Noah called to his Lord and said, "My Lord, indeed my son is of my family; and indeed, Your promise is true; and You are the most just of judges!"
verses.hausa: Kuma Nũhu ya kira Ubangijinsa, sa'an nan ya ce: "Yã Ubangijina! Lalle ne ɗãna na daga iyãlĩna! Kuma haƙĩƙa wa'adinKa gaskiya ne, kuma Kai ne Mafi hukuncin mãsu yin hukunci."

verses.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰنُوحُ إِنَّهُۥ لَيْسَ مِنْ أَهْلِكَ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَمَلٌ غَيْرُ صَـٰلِحٍ ۖ فَلَا تَسْـَٔلْنِ مَا لَيْسَ لَكَ بِهِۦ عِلْمٌ ۖ إِنِّىٓ أَعِظُكَ أَن تَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْجَـٰهِلِينَ
verses.english: He said, "O Noah, indeed he is not of your family; indeed, he is [one whose] work was other than righteous, so ask Me not for that about which you have no knowledge. Indeed, I advise you, lest you be among the ignorant."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Yã Nũhu! Lalle ne shi bã ya a ciki iyãlanka, lalle ne shĩ, aiki ne wanda ba na ƙwarai ba, sabõda haka kada ka tambaye Ni abin da bã ka da ilmi a kansa. Haƙĩƙa, Nĩ Inã yi maka gargaɗi kada ka kasance daga jãhilai."

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّىٓ أَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنْ أَسْـَٔلَكَ مَا لَيْسَ لِى بِهِۦ عِلْمٌ ۖ وَإِلَّا تَغْفِرْ لِى وَتَرْحَمْنِىٓ أَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ
verses.english: [Noah] said, "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from asking that of which I have no knowledge. And unless You forgive me and have mercy upon me, I will be among the losers."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Yã Ubangijina! Lalle ne nĩ, inã nẽman tsari gare Ka da in tambaye Ka abin da bã ni da wani ilmi a kansa. Idan ba Ka gãfarta mini ba, kuma Ka yi mini rahama, zan kasance daga mãsu hasãra."

verses.arabic: قِيلَ يَـٰنُوحُ ٱهْبِطْ بِسَلَـٰمٍ مِّنَّا وَبَرَكَـٰتٍ عَلَيْكَ وَعَلَىٰٓ أُمَمٍ مِّمَّن مَّعَكَ ۚ وَأُمَمٌ سَنُمَتِّعُهُمْ ثُمَّ يَمَسُّهُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.english: It was said, "O Noah, disembark in security from Us and blessings upon you and upon nations [descending] from those with you. But other nations [of them] We will grant enjoyment; then there will touch them from Us a painful punishment."
verses.hausa: Aka ce: "Ya Nũhu! Ka sauka da aminci da, a gare Mu da albarka a kanka, kuma rahama ta tabbata a kan waɗansu al'ummõmi daga waɗanda suke tãre da kai. Da waɗansu al'ummõmi da zã Mu jiyar da su dãɗi, sa'an nan kuma azãba mai raɗaɗi ta shafe su daga gare Mu."

verses.arabic: تِلْكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلْغَيْبِ نُوحِيهَآ إِلَيْكَ ۖ مَا كُنتَ تَعْلَمُهَآ أَنتَ وَلَا قَوْمُكَ مِن قَبْلِ هَـٰذَا ۖ فَٱصْبِرْ ۖ إِنَّ ٱلْعَـٰقِبَةَ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.english: That is from the news of the unseen which We reveal to you, [O Muhammad]. You knew it not, neither you nor your people, before this. So be patient; indeed, the [best] outcome is for the righteous.
verses.hausa: Waccan ƙissa tanã daga lãbãran gaibi, Munã yin wahayinsu zuwa gare ka (Muhammadu). Ba ka kasance kanã sanin su ba, haka kuma mutãnenka ba su sani ba daga gabãnin wannan. Sai ka yi haƙuri. Lalle ne ãƙiba tanã ga mãsu taƙawa,

verses.arabic: وَإِلَىٰ عَادٍ أَخَاهُمْ هُودًا ۚ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا مُفْتَرُونَ
verses.english: And to 'Aad [We sent] their brother Hud. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. You are not but inventors [of falsehood].
verses.hausa: Kuma zuwa ga Ãdãwa, (Mun aika) ɗan'uwansu Hũdu. Ya ce: "Yã kũ mutãnena! Ku bauta wa Allah. Ba ku da wani abin bautãwa fãce Shi. Ba ku kasance ba fãce kunã mãsu ƙirƙirãwa.

verses.arabic: يَـٰقَوْمِ لَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ أَجْرًا ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنِىٓ ۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.english: O my people, I do not ask you for it any reward. My reward is only from the one who created me. Then will you not reason?
verses.hausa: "Yã ku mutãnena! Bã ni tambayar ku wata ijãra a kansa, ijãrata ba ta zama ba, fãce ga wanda Ya ƙãga halittata. Shin fa, bã ku hankalta?"

verses.arabic: وَيَـٰقَوْمِ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ يُرْسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًا وَيَزِدْكُمْ قُوَّةً إِلَىٰ قُوَّتِكُمْ وَلَا تَتَوَلَّوْا۟ مُجْرِمِينَ
verses.english: And O my people, ask forgiveness of your Lord and then repent to Him. He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in showers and increase you in strength [added] to your strength. And do not turn away, [being] criminals."
verses.hausa: "Kuma, ya mutãnena! Ku nẽmi Ubangijinku gãfara, sa'an nan kuma ku tũba zuwa gare Shi, zai saki sama a kanku, tanã mai yawan zubar da ruwa, kuma Ya ƙãra muku wani ƙarfi ga ƙarfinku. Kuma kada ku jũya kunã mãsu laifi."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰهُودُ مَا جِئْتَنَا بِبَيِّنَةٍ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِتَارِكِىٓ ءَالِهَتِنَا عَن قَوْلِكَ وَمَا نَحْنُ لَكَ بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: They said, "O Hud, you have not brought us clear evidence, and we are not ones to leave our gods on your say-so. Nor are we believers in you.
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Yã Hũdu! Ba ka zo mana da wata hujja bayyananna ba, kuma ba mu zama mãsu barin abũbuwan bautawarmu ba dõmin maganarka, kuma ba mu zama mãsu yin ĩmãni da kai ba."

verses.arabic: إِن نَّقُولُ إِلَّا ٱعْتَرَىٰكَ بَعْضُ ءَالِهَتِنَا بِسُوٓءٍ ۗ قَالَ إِنِّىٓ أُشْهِدُ ٱللَّهَ وَٱشْهَدُوٓا۟ أَنِّى بَرِىٓءٌ مِّمَّا تُشْرِكُونَ
verses.english: We only say that some of our gods have possessed you with evil." He said, "Indeed, I call Allah to witness, and witness [yourselves] that I am free from whatever you associate with Allah
verses.hausa: "Bã mu cẽwa, sai dai kurum sashen abũbuwan bautawarmu ya sãme ka da cũtar hauka." Yace: "Lalle ne nĩ, inã shaida waAllah, kuma ku yi shaidar cẽwa" lalle ne nĩ mai barranta ne dagb abin da kuke yin shirki da shi."

verses.arabic: مِن دُونِهِۦ ۖ فَكِيدُونِى جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ لَا تُنظِرُونِ
verses.english: Other than Him. So plot against me all together; then do not give me respite.
verses.hausa: "Baicin Allah: Sai ku yi mini kaidi gabã ɗaya, sa'an nan kuma kada ku yi mini jinkiri."

verses.arabic: إِنِّى تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ رَبِّى وَرَبِّكُم ۚ مَّا مِن دَآبَّةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ ءَاخِذٌۢ بِنَاصِيَتِهَآ ۚ إِنَّ رَبِّى عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.english: Indeed, I have relied upon Allah, my Lord and your Lord. There is no creature but that He holds its forelock. Indeed, my Lord is on a path [that is] straight."
verses.hausa: "Haƙĩƙa, ni na dõgara ga Allah, Ubangijĩna kuma Ubangijinku. Bãbu wata dabba fãce Shi ne Mai riko ga kwarkwaɗarta. Haƙĩƙa, Ubangijĩna Yanã (kan) tafarki madaidaici."

verses.arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَقَدْ أَبْلَغْتُكُم مَّآ أُرْسِلْتُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَيْكُمْ ۚ وَيَسْتَخْلِفُ رَبِّى قَوْمًا غَيْرَكُمْ وَلَا تَضُرُّونَهُۥ شَيْـًٔا ۚ إِنَّ رَبِّى عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ حَفِيظٌ
verses.english: But if they turn away, [say], "I have already conveyed that with which I was sent to you. My Lord will give succession to a people other than you, and you will not harm Him at all. Indeed my Lord is, over all things, Guardian."
verses.hausa: "To! Idan kun jũya, haƙĩƙa, nã iyar muku abin da aka aiko ni da shi zuwa gare ku. Kuma Ubangijĩna Yanã musanya waɗansu mutãne, waɗansunku su maye muku. Kuma bã ku cũtar Sa da kõme. Lalle Ubangijina a kan dukkan kõme, Matsari ne."

verses.arabic: وَلَمَّا جَآءَ أَمْرُنَا نَجَّيْنَا هُودًا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ بِرَحْمَةٍ مِّنَّا وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُم مِّنْ عَذَابٍ غَلِيظٍ
verses.english: And when Our command came, We saved Hud and those who believed with him, by mercy from Us; and We saved them from a harsh punishment.
verses.hausa: Kuma a lõkacin da umurninmu ya je, Muka kuɓutar da Hũdu da waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni tãre da shi, sabõdawata rahama daga gare Mu. Kuma Muka kuɓutr da su daga azãba mai kauri.

verses.arabic: وَتِلْكَ عَادٌ ۖ جَحَدُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَعَصَوْا۟ رُسُلَهُۥ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَ كُلِّ جَبَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
verses.english: And that was 'Aad, who rejected the signs of their Lord and disobeyed His messengers and followed the order of every obstinate tyrant.
verses.hausa: Haka Ãdãwa suka kasance, sun yi musun ãyõyin Ubangijinsu, kuma sun sãɓa wa ManzanninSa, kuma sun bi umurnin dukan mai girman kai, makangari.

verses.arabic: وَأُتْبِعُوا۟ فِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنْيَا لَعْنَةً وَيَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ عَادًا كَفَرُوا۟ رَبَّهُمْ ۗ أَلَا بُعْدًا لِّعَادٍ قَوْمِ هُودٍ
verses.english: And they were [therefore] followed in this world with a curse and [as well] on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, 'Aad denied their Lord; then away with 'Aad, the people of Hud.
verses.hausa: Kuma an biyar musu da la'ana a cikin wannan dũniyada Rãnar Kiyãma. To! Lalle ne Ãdãwa sun kãfirta da Ubangijinsu. To, Nĩsa ya tabbata ga Ãdãwa, mutãnen Hũdu!

verses.arabic: وَإِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمْ صَـٰلِحًا ۚ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥ ۖ هُوَ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱسْتَعْمَرَكُمْ فِيهَا فَٱسْتَغْفِرُوهُ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبِّى قَرِيبٌ مُّجِيبٌ
verses.english: And to Thamud [We sent] their brother Salih. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. He has produced you from the earth and settled you in it, so ask forgiveness of Him and then repent to Him. Indeed, my Lord is near and responsive."
verses.hausa: Kuma zuwa ga Samũdãwa (an aika) ɗan'uwansu Sãlihu. Ya ce: "Ya mutãnena! Ku bauta wa Allah. Bã ku da wani abin bautãwa fãce Shi. Shĩ ne Ya ƙãga halittarku daga ƙasa, kuma Ya sanya ku mãsu yin kyarkyara a cikinta. Sai ku nẽme Shi gãfara, sa'an nan kuma ku tũba zuwa gare Shi. Lalle Ubangijina Makusanci ne Mai karɓãwa."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰصَـٰلِحُ قَدْ كُنتَ فِينَا مَرْجُوًّا قَبْلَ هَـٰذَآ ۖ أَتَنْهَىٰنَآ أَن نَّعْبُدَ مَا يَعْبُدُ ءَابَآؤُنَا وَإِنَّنَا لَفِى شَكٍّ مِّمَّا تَدْعُونَآ إِلَيْهِ مُرِيبٍ
verses.english: They said, "O Salih, you were among us a man of promise before this. Do you forbid us to worship what our fathers worshipped? And indeed we are, about that to which you invite us, in disquieting doubt."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Ya Sãlihu! Haƙĩƙa, kã kasance a cikinmu, wanda ake fatan wani alhẽri da shi a gabãnin wannan. Shin kana hana mu bauta wa abin da ubanninmu suke bauta wa? Kuma haƙĩƙa mũ, munã cikin shakka daga abin da kake kiran mu gare shi, mai sanya kõkanto."

verses.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِن كُنتُ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّى وَءَاتَىٰنِى مِنْهُ رَحْمَةً فَمَن يَنصُرُنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِنْ عَصَيْتُهُۥ ۖ فَمَا تَزِيدُونَنِى غَيْرَ تَخْسِيرٍ
verses.english: He said, "O my people, have you considered: if I should be upon clear evidence from my Lord and He has given me mercy from Himself, who would protect me from Allah if I disobeyed Him? So you would not increase me except in loss.
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ya mutãnẽna! Kun gani? Idan na kasance a kan hujja bayyananna daga Ubangijina, kuma Ya bã ni rahama daga gare Shi, to, wane ne zai taimake ni daga Allah idan nã sãɓa Masa? Sa'an nan bã zã ku ƙãre ni da kõme ba fãce hasãra."

verses.arabic: وَيَـٰقَوْمِ هَـٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةُ ٱللَّهِ لَكُمْ ءَايَةً فَذَرُوهَا تَأْكُلْ فِىٓ أَرْضِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٍ فَيَأْخُذَكُمْ عَذَابٌ قَرِيبٌ
verses.english: And O my people, this is the she-camel of Allah - [she is] to you a sign. So let her feed upon Allah 's earth and do not touch her with harm, or you will be taken by an impending punishment."
verses.hausa: "Kuma ya mutãnena! wannan rãƙumar Allah ce, tanã ãyã a gare ku. Sai ku bar ta ta ci a cikin ƙasar Allah, kuma kada ku shãfe ta da wata cũta kar azãba makusanciya ta kãma ku."

verses.arabic: فَعَقَرُوهَا فَقَالَ تَمَتَّعُوا۟ فِى دَارِكُمْ ثَلَـٰثَةَ أَيَّامٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ وَعْدٌ غَيْرُ مَكْذُوبٍ
verses.english: But they hamstrung her, so he said, "Enjoy yourselves in your homes for three days. That is a promise not to be denied."
verses.hausa: Sai suka sõke ta. Sai ya ce: "Kuji dãɗi a cikin gidãjenku kwãna uku. Wannan wa'adi ne bã abin ƙaryatãwa ba."

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ أَمْرُنَا نَجَّيْنَا صَـٰلِحًا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ بِرَحْمَةٍ مِّنَّا وَمِنْ خِزْىِ يَوْمِئِذٍ ۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ ٱلْقَوِىُّ ٱلْعَزِيزُ
verses.english: So when Our command came, We saved Salih and those who believed with him, by mercy from Us, and [saved them] from the disgrace of that day. Indeed, it is your Lord who is the Powerful, the Exalted in Might.
verses.hausa: To, a lõkacin da umurninMu ya je, muka kuɓutar da Sãlihu da waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni tãre da shi, sabõda wata rahama daga gare Mu, kuma daga wulãkancin rãnar nan. Lalle ne Ubangijinka Shĩ neMai ƙarfi, Mabuwãyi.

verses.arabic: وَأَخَذَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ فَأَصْبَحُوا۟ فِى دِيَـٰرِهِمْ جَـٰثِمِينَ
verses.english: And the shriek seized those who had wronged, and they became within their homes [corpses] fallen prone
verses.hausa: Sai tsãwa ta kãma waɗanda suka yi zãlunci, sai suka wãyi gari sunã guggurfãne a cikin gidãjensu.

verses.arabic: كَأَن لَّمْ يَغْنَوْا۟ فِيهَآ ۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ ثَمُودَا۟ كَفَرُوا۟ رَبَّهُمْ ۗ أَلَا بُعْدًا لِّثَمُودَ
verses.english: As if they had never prospered therein. Unquestionably, Thamud denied their Lord; then, away with Thamud.
verses.hausa: Kamar dai ba su zauna a cikinta ba. To! Lalle ne samũdãwa sun kãfirce wa Ubangijinsu. To, Nĩsa ya tabbata ga Samũdãwa.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَتْ رُسُلُنَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ بِٱلْبُشْرَىٰ قَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا ۖ قَالَ سَلَـٰمٌ ۖ فَمَا لَبِثَ أَن جَآءَ بِعِجْلٍ حَنِيذٍ
verses.english: And certainly did Our messengers come to Abraham with good tidings; they said, "Peace." He said, "Peace," and did not delay in bringing [them] a roasted calf.
verses.hausa: Kuma haƙĩƙa, manzanninMu sun je wa Ibrãhim da bushãra suka ce: "Aminci." Ya ce: "Aminci (ya tabbata a gare ku)." Sa'an nan bai yi jinkiri ba ya je da maraƙi ƙawãtacce.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا رَءَآ أَيْدِيَهُمْ لَا تَصِلُ إِلَيْهِ نَكِرَهُمْ وَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةً ۚ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمِ لُوطٍ
verses.english: But when he saw their hands not reaching for it, he distrusted them and felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not. We have been sent to the people of Lot."
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan a lõkacin da ya ga hannayensu bã su sãduwa zuwa gare shi (maraƙin), sai ya yi ƙyãmarsu, kuma ya ji tsõronsu. Suka ce, "Kada kaji tsõro lalle ne mũ, an aiko mu ne zuwa ga mutãnen Lũɗu"

verses.arabic: وَٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ قَآئِمَةٌ فَضَحِكَتْ فَبَشَّرْنَـٰهَا بِإِسْحَـٰقَ وَمِن وَرَآءِ إِسْحَـٰقَ يَعْقُوبَ
verses.english: And his Wife was standing, and she smiled. Then We gave her good tidings of Isaac and after Isaac, Jacob.
verses.hausa: Kuma mãtarsa tanã tsaye. Ta yi dãriya. Sai Muka yi mata bushãra (da haihuwar) Is'hãƙa, kuma a bayan Is'hãƙa, Yãƙũbu.

verses.arabic: قَالَتْ يَـٰوَيْلَتَىٰٓ ءَأَلِدُ وَأَنَا۠ عَجُوزٌ وَهَـٰذَا بَعْلِى شَيْخًا ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
verses.english: She said, "Woe to me! Shall I give birth while I am an old woman and this, my husband, is an old man? Indeed, this is an amazing thing!"
verses.hausa: Sai ta ce: "Yã kaitõna! Shin, zan haihu ne alhãli kuwa inã tsõhuwa, kuma ga mijĩna tsõho ne? Lalle wannan, haƙĩƙa, abu ne mai ban mãmãki."

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَتَعْجَبِينَ مِنْ أَمْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ رَحْمَتُ ٱللَّهِ وَبَرَكَـٰتُهُۥ عَلَيْكُمْ أَهْلَ ٱلْبَيْتِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَمِيدٌ مَّجِيدٌ
verses.english: They said, "Are you amazed at the decree of Allah? May the mercy of Allah and His blessings be upon you, people of the house. Indeed, He is Praiseworthy and Honorable."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Shin kinã mãmaki ne daga al'amarin Allah? Rahamar Allah da albarkarSa su tabbata a kanku, ya mutãnen babban gida! Lalle ne Shĩ abin gõdewa ne, Mai girma."

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا ذَهَبَ عَنْ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ٱلرَّوْعُ وَجَآءَتْهُ ٱلْبُشْرَىٰ يُجَـٰدِلُنَا فِى قَوْمِ لُوطٍ
verses.english: And when the fright had left Abraham and the good tidings had reached him, he began to argue with Us concerning the people of Lot.
verses.hausa: To, a lõkacin da firgita ta tafi daga Ibrãhĩm, kuma bushãra tã je masa, Yanã mai jayayya a gare Mu, sabõda mutãnen Lũɗu!

verses.arabic: إِنَّ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ لَحَلِيمٌ أَوَّٰهٌ مُّنِيبٌ
verses.english: Indeed, Abraham was forbearing, grieving and [frequently] returning [to Allah].
verses.hausa: Lalle Ibrãhĩm, haƙĩƙa mai haƙuri ne, mai yawan addu'a, mai tawakkali.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ أَعْرِضْ عَنْ هَـٰذَآ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ قَدْ جَآءَ أَمْرُ رَبِّكَ ۖ وَإِنَّهُمْ ءَاتِيهِمْ عَذَابٌ غَيْرُ مَرْدُودٍ
verses.english: [The angels said], "O Abraham, give up this [plea]. Indeed, the command of your Lord has come, and indeed, there will reach them a punishment that cannot be repelled."
verses.hausa: Ya Ibrãhĩm! Ka bijira daga wannan. Lalle shi, haƙĩƙa, umurnin Ubangijinka ne ya zo, kuma lalle ne sũ, abin da yake mai je musu azãba ce wadda bã a iya hanãwa.

verses.arabic: وَلَمَّا جَآءَتْ رُسُلُنَا لُوطًا سِىٓءَ بِهِمْ وَضَاقَ بِهِمْ ذَرْعًا وَقَالَ هَـٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَصِيبٌ
verses.english: And when Our messengers, [the angels], came to Lot, he was anguished for them and felt for them great discomfort and said, "This is a trying day."
verses.hausa: Kuma a lõkacin da manzanninMu suka je wa Lũɗu aka ɓãta masa rai game da su, ya, ƙuntata rai sabõda su. Ya ce: "Wannan yini ne mai tsananin masĩfa."

verses.arabic: وَجَآءَهُۥ قَوْمُهُۥ يُهْرَعُونَ إِلَيْهِ وَمِن قَبْلُ كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ ۚ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِى هُنَّ أَطْهَرُ لَكُمْ ۖ فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُخْزُونِ فِى ضَيْفِىٓ ۖ أَلَيْسَ مِنكُمْ رَجُلٌ رَّشِيدٌ
verses.english: And his people came hastening to him, and before [this] they had been doing evil deeds. He said, "O my people, these are my daughters; they are purer for you. So fear Allah and do not disgrace me concerning my guests. Is there not among you a man of reason?"
verses.hausa: Kuma mutãnensa suka je masa sunã gaggãwa zuwa gare shi, kuma a gabãni, sun kasance sunã aikatãwar mũnãnan ayyuka. Ya ce: "Yã mutãnẽna! waɗannan, 'yã'yã na sũ ne mafiya tsarki a gare ku. Sai ku bi Allah da taƙawa, kuma kada ku wulãkantã ni a cikin bãƙĩna. Shin, bãbu wani namiji shiryayye daga gare ku?"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَقَدْ عَلِمْتَ مَا لَنَا فِى بَنَاتِكَ مِنْ حَقٍّ وَإِنَّكَ لَتَعْلَمُ مَا نُرِيدُ
verses.english: They said, "You have already known that we have not concerning your daughters any claim, and indeed, you know what we want."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Lalle, haƙĩƙa kã sani, bã mu da wani hakki a cikin 'ya'yanka, kuma lalle kai haƙĩƙa, kanã sane da abin da muke nufi."

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَوْ أَنَّ لِى بِكُمْ قُوَّةً أَوْ ءَاوِىٓ إِلَىٰ رُكْنٍ شَدِيدٍ
verses.english: He said, "If only I had against you some power or could take refuge in a strong support."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Dã dai inã da wani ƙarfi game da ku, kõ kuwa inã da gõyon bãya daga wani rukuni mai ƙarfi?"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰلُوطُ إِنَّا رُسُلُ رَبِّكَ لَن يَصِلُوٓا۟ إِلَيْكَ ۖ فَأَسْرِ بِأَهْلِكَ بِقِطْعٍ مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ وَلَا يَلْتَفِتْ مِنكُمْ أَحَدٌ إِلَّا ٱمْرَأَتَكَ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ مُصِيبُهَا مَآ أَصَابَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ مَوْعِدَهُمُ ٱلصُّبْحُ ۚ أَلَيْسَ ٱلصُّبْحُ بِقَرِيبٍ
verses.english: The angels said, "O Lot, indeed we are messengers of your Lord; [therefore], they will never reach you. So set out with your family during a portion of the night and let not any among you look back - except your wife; indeed, she will be struck by that which strikes them. Indeed, their appointment is [for] the morning. Is not the morning near?"
verses.hausa: (Manzannin) Suka ce: "Yã Lũɗu! Lalle mũ, manzannin Ubangijinka ne. Bã zã su iya sãduwa zuwa gare ka ba. Sai ka yi tafiyarka a wani yankin dare da iyãlinka, kuma kada wani daga gare ku ya waiwaya fãce mãtarka. Lalle ne abin da ya same su mai sãmunta ne. Lalle wa'adinsu lõkacin sãfiya ne. Shin lõkacin sãfiya bã kusa ba ne?"

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ أَمْرُنَا جَعَلْنَا عَـٰلِيَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهَا حِجَارَةً مِّن سِجِّيلٍ مَّنضُودٍ
verses.english: So when Our command came, We made the highest part [of the city] its lowest and rained upon them stones of layered hard clay, [which were]
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan a lõkacin da umurninMu ya je, Muka sanya na samanta ya zama na ƙasanta, kuma Muka yi ruwan duwãtsu a kanta (ƙasar Lũɗu) daga taɓocũrarre.

verses.arabic: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ ۖ وَمَا هِىَ مِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ بِبَعِيدٍ
verses.english: Marked from your Lord. And Allah 's punishment is not from the wrongdoers [very] far.
verses.hausa: Alamtacce a wurin Ubangijinka. Kuma ita (ƙasar Lũɗu) ba ta zama mai nĩsa ba daga azzãlumai (kuraishãwa).

verses.arabic: وَإِلَىٰ مَدْيَنَ أَخَاهُمْ شُعَيْبًا ۚ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥ ۖ وَلَا تَنقُصُوا۟ ٱلْمِكْيَالَ وَٱلْمِيزَانَ ۚ إِنِّىٓ أَرَىٰكُم بِخَيْرٍ وَإِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ مُّحِيطٍ
verses.english: And to Madyan [We sent] their brother Shu'ayb. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. And do not decrease from the measure and the scale. Indeed, I see you in prosperity, but indeed, I fear for you the punishment of an all-encompassing Day.
verses.hausa: Kuma zuwa ga Madyana (Mun aika) ɗan'uwansu Shu'aibu. Ya ce: "Ya Mutãnena! Ku bauta wa Allah. Ba ku da wani abin bautãwa fãce shi kuma kada ku rage mũdu da sikẽli. Lalle nĩ, inã ganin ku da wadãta. Kuma lalle inã ji muku tsõron azãbar yini mai kẽwayẽwa."

verses.arabic: وَيَـٰقَوْمِ أَوْفُوا۟ ٱلْمِكْيَالَ وَٱلْمِيزَانَ بِٱلْقِسْطِ ۖ وَلَا تَبْخَسُوا۟ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشْيَآءَهُمْ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُفْسِدِينَ
verses.english: And O my people, give full measure and weight in justice and do not deprive the people of their due and do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption.
verses.hausa: "Ya mutãnẽna! Ku cika mũdu da sikẽli da ãdalci, kuma kada ku naƙasta wa mutãne kãyansu, kuma kada ku yi ɓarnã a cikin ƙasa kunã mãsu fasãdi."

verses.arabic: بَقِيَّتُ ٱللَّهِ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ ۚ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ عَلَيْكُم بِحَفِيظٍ
verses.english: What remains [lawful] from Allah is best for you, if you would be believers. But I am not a guardian over you."
verses.hausa: "Falalar Allah mai wanzuwa ita ce mafi alhẽri a gare ku idan kun kasance muminai, kuma ni bã mai tsaro ne a kanku ba."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰشُعَيْبُ أَصَلَوٰتُكَ تَأْمُرُكَ أَن نَّتْرُكَ مَا يَعْبُدُ ءَابَآؤُنَآ أَوْ أَن نَّفْعَلَ فِىٓ أَمْوَٰلِنَا مَا نَشَـٰٓؤُا۟ ۖ إِنَّكَ لَأَنتَ ٱلْحَلِيمُ ٱلرَّشِيدُ
verses.english: They said, "O Shu'ayb, does your prayer command you that we should leave what our fathers worship or not do with our wealth what we please? Indeed, you are the forbearing, the discerning!"
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Yã Shu'aibu! Shin sallarka ce take umurtar ka ga mu bar abin da ubanninmu suke bautãwa, kõ kuwa mu bar aikata abin da muke so a cikin dũkiyõyinmu? Lalle, haƙĩƙa kai ne mai haƙuri shiryayye!"

verses.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِن كُنتُ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّى وَرَزَقَنِى مِنْهُ رِزْقًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَنْ أُخَالِفَكُمْ إِلَىٰ مَآ أَنْهَىٰكُمْ عَنْهُ ۚ إِنْ أُرِيدُ إِلَّا ٱلْإِصْلَـٰحَ مَا ٱسْتَطَعْتُ ۚ وَمَا تَوْفِيقِىٓ إِلَّا بِٱللَّهِ ۚ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَإِلَيْهِ أُنِيبُ
verses.english: He said, "O my people, have you considered: if I am upon clear evidence from my Lord and He has provided me with a good provision from Him...? And I do not intend to differ from you in that which I have forbidden you; I only intend reform as much as I am able. And my success is not but through Allah. Upon him I have relied, and to Him I return.
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ya mutãnena! Kun gani idan no kasance a kan hujja bayyananniya daga Ubangijina, kuma Ya azurta nĩ da arzikimai kyãwo daga gare Shi? Kuma bã ni nufin in sãɓa muku zuwa ga abin da nake hana ku daga gare shi. Bã ni nufin kõme fãce gyãrã, gwargwadon da na sãmi dãma. Kuma muwãfaƙãta ba ta zama ba fãce daga Allah. A gare shi na dõgara, kuma zuwa gare Shi na wakkala."

verses.arabic: وَيَـٰقَوْمِ لَا يَجْرِمَنَّكُمْ شِقَاقِىٓ أَن يُصِيبَكُم مِّثْلُ مَآ أَصَابَ قَوْمَ نُوحٍ أَوْ قَوْمَ هُودٍ أَوْ قَوْمَ صَـٰلِحٍ ۚ وَمَا قَوْمُ لُوطٍ مِّنكُم بِبَعِيدٍ
verses.english: And O my people, let not [your] dissension from me cause you to be struck by that similar to what struck the people of Noah or the people of Hud or the people of Salih. And the people of Lot are not from you far away.
verses.hausa: "Kuma ya mutãnena! Kada sãɓa mini ya ɗauke ku ga misãlin abin da ya sãmi mutãnen Nũhu kõ kuwa mutãnen Hũdu kõ kuwa mutãnen Sãlihu ya sãme ku. Mutãnen Lũɗu ba su zama a wuri mai nĩsa ba daga gare ku."

verses.arabic: وَٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبِّى رَحِيمٌ وَدُودٌ
verses.english: And ask forgiveness of your Lord and then repent to Him. Indeed, my Lord is Merciful and Affectionate."
verses.hausa: "Kuma ku nẽmi Ubangijinku gãfara, sa'an nan kuma ku tũba zuwa gare shi. Lalle Ubangijĩna Mai Jin ƙai ne, Mai nũna sõyayya."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰشُعَيْبُ مَا نَفْقَهُ كَثِيرًا مِّمَّا تَقُولُ وَإِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِينَا ضَعِيفًا ۖ وَلَوْلَا رَهْطُكَ لَرَجَمْنَـٰكَ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْنَا بِعَزِيزٍ
verses.english: They said, "O Shu'ayb, we do not understand much of what you say, and indeed, we consider you among us as weak. And if not for your family, we would have stoned you [to death]; and you are not to us one respected."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Yã Shu'aibu! Bã mu fahimta da yawa daga abin da kake faɗi, kuma munã ganin ka mai rauni a cikinmu. Kuma bã dõmin jama'arka ba dã mun jẽfe ka, sabõda ba ka zama mai daraja a gunmu ba."

verses.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ أَرَهْطِىٓ أَعَزُّ عَلَيْكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَٱتَّخَذْتُمُوهُ وَرَآءَكُمْ ظِهْرِيًّا ۖ إِنَّ رَبِّى بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ مُحِيطٌ
verses.english: He said, "O my people, is my family more respected for power by you than Allah? But you put Him behind your backs [in neglect]. Indeed, my Lord is encompassing of what you do.
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ya mutãnena! Ashe, jama'ãta ce mafi daraja a gare ku daga Allah, kuma kun riƙẽ Shi a bãyanku abin jẽfarwa? Lallene Ubangijĩna Mai kẽwayẽwa nega abin da kuke aikatãwa."

verses.arabic: وَيَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِنِّى عَـٰمِلٌ ۖ سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ مَن يَأْتِيهِ عَذَابٌ يُخْزِيهِ وَمَنْ هُوَ كَـٰذِبٌ ۖ وَٱرْتَقِبُوٓا۟ إِنِّى مَعَكُمْ رَقِيبٌ
verses.english: And O my people, work according to your position; indeed, I am working. You are going to know to whom will come a punishment that will disgrace him and who is a liar. So watch; indeed, I am with you a watcher, [awaiting the outcome]."
verses.hausa: "Kuma ya mutãnena! Ku yi aiki a kan hãlinku. Lalle nĩmai aiki ne. Da sannu zã ku san wãne ne azãba zã ta zo masa, ta wulakanta shi, kuma wãne ne maƙaryaci. Kuma ku yi jiran dãko, lalle ni mai dãko ne tãre da ku."

verses.arabic: وَلَمَّا جَآءَ أَمْرُنَا نَجَّيْنَا شُعَيْبًا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ بِرَحْمَةٍ مِّنَّا وَأَخَذَتِ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ فَأَصْبَحُوا۟ فِى دِيَـٰرِهِمْ جَـٰثِمِينَ
verses.english: And when Our command came, We saved Shu'ayb and those who believed with him, by mercy from Us. And the shriek seized those who had wronged, and they became within their homes [corpses] fallen prone
verses.hausa: Kuma a lõkacin da umurninMu yã je, Muka kuɓutar da Shu'aibu da waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni tãre da shi, sabõda wata rahama daga gare, Mu. Kuma tsãwa ta kama waɗanda suka yi zãlunci. Sai suka wãyi gari guggurfãne a cikin gidãjensu.

verses.arabic: كَأَن لَّمْ يَغْنَوْا۟ فِيهَآ ۗ أَلَا بُعْدًا لِّمَدْيَنَ كَمَا بَعِدَتْ ثَمُودُ
verses.english: As if they had never prospered therein. Then, away with Madyan as Thamud was taken away.
verses.hausa: Kamar ba su zaunã ba a cikinsu. To, halaka ta tabbata ga Madyana kamar yadda Samũdãwa suka halaka.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.english: And We did certainly send Moses with Our signs and a clear authority
verses.hausa: Kuma haƙĩƙa Mun aiki Mũsã da ãyõyinMu, da dalĩli bayyananne.

verses.arabic: إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِي۟هِۦ فَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَ فِرْعَوْنَ ۖ وَمَآ أَمْرُ فِرْعَوْنَ بِرَشِيدٍ
verses.english: To Pharaoh and his establishment, but they followed the command of Pharaoh, and the command of Pharaoh was not [at all] discerning.
verses.hausa: Zuwa ga Fir'auna da majalisarsa. Sai suka bi umurnin Fir'auna, amma al'amarin Fir'auna bai zama shiryayye ba.

verses.arabic: يَقْدُمُ قَوْمَهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فَأَوْرَدَهُمُ ٱلنَّارَ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْوِرْدُ ٱلْمَوْرُودُ
verses.english: He will precede his people on the Day of Resurrection and lead them into the Fire; and wretched is the place to which they are led.
verses.hausa: Yanã shũgabantar mutãnensa a Rãnar Kiyãma, har ya tuzgar da su a wuta. Kuma tir da irin tuzgãwarsu.

verses.arabic: وَأُتْبِعُوا۟ فِى هَـٰذِهِۦ لَعْنَةً وَيَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ بِئْسَ ٱلرِّفْدُ ٱلْمَرْفُودُ
verses.english: And they were followed in this [world] with a curse and on the Day of Resurrection. And wretched is the gift which is given.
verses.hausa: Kuma aka biyar musu da la'ana a cikin wannan dũniyada Rãnar Kiyãma. Tir da kyautar da ake yi musu.

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلْقُرَىٰ نَقُصُّهُۥ عَلَيْكَ ۖ مِنْهَا قَآئِمٌ وَحَصِيدٌ
verses.english: That is from the news of the cities, which We relate to you; of them, some are [still] standing and some are [as] a harvest [mowed down].
verses.hausa: Wancan Yanã daga lãbãran alƙaryõyi. Munã bã ka lãbãrinsu, daga gare su akwai wanda ke tsaye da kuma girbabbe.

verses.arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمْنَـٰهُمْ وَلَـٰكِن ظَلَمُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ ۖ فَمَآ أَغْنَتْ عَنْهُمْ ءَالِهَتُهُمُ ٱلَّتِى يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن شَىْءٍ لَّمَّا جَآءَ أَمْرُ رَبِّكَ ۖ وَمَا زَادُوهُمْ غَيْرَ تَتْبِيبٍ
verses.english: And We did not wrong them, but they wronged themselves. And they were not availed at all by their gods which they invoked other than Allah when there came the command of your Lord. And they did not increase them in other than ruin.
verses.hausa: Kuma ba Mu zãlunce su ba, amma sun zãlunci kansu sa'an nan abũbuwan bautawarsu waɗanda suke kiran su, baicin Allah, ba su wadãtar musu kõme ba a lõkacin da umurnin Ubangijinka ya je, kuma (gumãkan) ba su ƙãra musu wani abu ba fãce hasãra.

verses.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَخْذُ رَبِّكَ إِذَآ أَخَذَ ٱلْقُرَىٰ وَهِىَ ظَـٰلِمَةٌ ۚ إِنَّ أَخْذَهُۥٓ أَلِيمٌ شَدِيدٌ
verses.english: And thus is the seizure of your Lord when He seizes the cities while they are committing wrong. Indeed, His seizure is painful and severe.
verses.hausa: Kuma kamar wancan ne kãmun Ubangijinka, idan Ya kãma alƙaryõyi alhãli kuwa sunã mãsu zãlunci. Lalle kamũnSa mai raɗaɗi ne, mai tsanani.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً لِّمَنْ خَافَ عَذَابَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمٌ مَّجْمُوعٌ لَّهُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمٌ مَّشْهُودٌ
verses.english: Indeed in that is a sign for those who fear the punishment of the Hereafter. That is a Day for which the people will be collected, and that is a Day [which will be] witnessed.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne a cikin wancan akwai ãyã ga wanda ya ji tsõron azãbar Lãhira. Wancan yini ne wanda ake tãra mutãne a cikinsa kuma wancan yini ne abin halarta.

verses.arabic: وَمَا نُؤَخِّرُهُۥٓ إِلَّا لِأَجَلٍ مَّعْدُودٍ
verses.english: And We do not delay it except for a limited term.
verses.hausa: Ba Mu jinkirtã shi ba fãce dõmin ajali ƙidãyayye.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يَأْتِ لَا تَكَلَّمُ نَفْسٌ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِۦ ۚ فَمِنْهُمْ شَقِىٌّ وَسَعِيدٌ
verses.english: The Day it comes no soul will speak except by His permission. And among them will be the wretched and the prosperous.
verses.hausa: Rãnar da za ta zo wani rai ba ya iya magana fãce da izninSa. Sa'an nan daga cikinsu akwai shaƙiyyi da mai arziki.

verses.arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ شَقُوا۟ فَفِى ٱلنَّارِ لَهُمْ فِيهَا زَفِيرٌ وَشَهِيقٌ
verses.english: As for those who were [destined to be] wretched, they will be in the Fire. For them therein is [violent] exhaling and inhaling.
verses.hausa: To, amma waɗanda suka yi shaƙãwa, to, sunã a cikin wuta. Sunã mãsu ƙãra da shẽka acikinta.

verses.arabic: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا مَا دَامَتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ رَبُّكَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
verses.english: [They will be] abiding therein as long as the heavens and the earth endure, except what your Lord should will. Indeed, your Lord is an effecter of what He intends.
verses.hausa: Suna madawwama a cikinta matuƙar sammai da ƙasa sun dawwama, fãce abin da Ubangijinka Ya so. Lalle Ubangijinka Mai aikatãwa ne ga abin da Yake nufi.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ سُعِدُوا۟ فَفِى ٱلْجَنَّةِ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا مَا دَامَتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ رَبُّكَ ۖ عَطَآءً غَيْرَ مَجْذُوذٍ
verses.english: And as for those who were [destined to be] prosperous, they will be in Paradise, abiding therein as long as the heavens and the earth endure, except what your Lord should will - a bestowal uninterrupted.
verses.hausa: Amma waɗanda suka yi arziki to, sunã a cikin Aljanna sunã madawwama, a cikinta, matuƙar sammai da ƙasa sun dawwama, fãce abin da Ubangijinka Ya so. Kyauta wadda bã ta yankẽwa.

verses.arabic: فَلَا تَكُ فِى مِرْيَةٍ مِّمَّا يَعْبُدُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ۚ مَا يَعْبُدُونَ إِلَّا كَمَا يَعْبُدُ ءَابَآؤُهُم مِّن قَبْلُ ۚ وَإِنَّا لَمُوَفُّوهُمْ نَصِيبَهُمْ غَيْرَ مَنقُوصٍ
verses.english: So do not be in doubt, [O Muhammad], as to what these [polytheists] are worshipping. They worship not except as their fathers worshipped before. And indeed, We will give them their share undiminished.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka kada ka kasance a cikin shakka daga abin da waɗannan suke bautawa. Bã su wata ibãda fãce kamar yadda ubanninsu ke aikatãwa a gabani. Kuma haƙĩƙa Mũ, Mãsu cika musu rabon su ne, bã tãre da nakasãwa ba.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ فَٱخْتُلِفَ فِيهِ ۚ وَلَوْلَا كَلِمَةٌ سَبَقَتْ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَفِى شَكٍّ مِّنْهُ مُرِيبٍ
verses.english: And We had certainly given Moses the Scripture, but it came under disagreement. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, it would have been judged between them. And indeed they are, concerning the Qur'an, in disquieting doubt.
verses.hausa: Kuma haƙĩƙa, Mun bai wa Mũsã littãfi, sai aka sãɓã wa jũna a cikinsa. Kuma bã dõmin wata kalma wadda ta gabãta daga Ubangijinka ba, haƙĩƙa, dã an yi hukunci a tsakãninsu. Kuma haƙĩƙa, sunã a cikin wata shakka, game da shi, mai sanya kõkanto.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ كُلًّا لَّمَّا لَيُوَفِّيَنَّهُمْ رَبُّكَ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِمَا يَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ
verses.english: And indeed, each [of the believers and disbelievers] - your Lord will fully compensate them for their deeds. Indeed, He is Acquainted with what they do.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle, haƙĩƙa, Ubangijinka Mai cika wa kõwa (sakamakon) ayyukansa ne. Lalle Shĩ, Mai ƙididdigewa ne ga abin da suke aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: فَٱسْتَقِمْ كَمَآ أُمِرْتَ وَمَن تَابَ مَعَكَ وَلَا تَطْغَوْا۟ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
verses.english: So remain on a right course as you have been commanded, [you] and those who have turned back with you [to Allah], and do not transgress. Indeed, He is Seeing of what you do.
verses.hausa: Sai ka daidaitu kamar yadda aka umurce ka, kai da waɗanda suka tũba tãre da kai kunã bã mãsu ƙẽtara haddi ba. Lalle shĩ, Mai gani ne ga abin da kuke aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَرْكَنُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ فَتَمَسَّكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِنْ أَوْلِيَآءَ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ
verses.english: And do not incline toward those who do wrong, lest you be touched by the Fire, and you would not have other than Allah any protectors; then you would not be helped.
verses.hausa: Kada ku karkata zuwa ga waɗanda suka yi zãlunci har wuta ta shãfe ku. Kuma bã ku da waɗansu majiɓinta baicin Allah, sa'an nan kuma bã zã a taimake ku ba.

verses.arabic: وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ طَرَفَىِ ٱلنَّهَارِ وَزُلَفًا مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلْحَسَنَـٰتِ يُذْهِبْنَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ذِكْرَىٰ لِلذَّٰكِرِينَ
verses.english: And establish prayer at the two ends of the day and at the approach of the night. Indeed, good deeds do away with misdeeds. That is a reminder for those who remember.
verses.hausa: Kuma ka tsai da salla a gẽfe guda biyu na yini da wani yanki daga dare. Lalle ne ayyukan ƙwarai sunã kõre mũnãnan ayyuka. wancan ne tunãtarwa ga mãsu tunãwa.

verses.arabic: وَٱصْبِرْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.english: And be patient, for indeed, Allah does not allow to be lost the reward of those who do good.
verses.hausa: Kuma ka yi haƙuri. Allah bã Ya tõzartar da lãdar mãsu kyautatãwa.

verses.arabic: فَلَوْلَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ أُو۟لُوا۟ بَقِيَّةٍ يَنْهَوْنَ عَنِ ٱلْفَسَادِ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا مِّمَّنْ أَنجَيْنَا مِنْهُمْ ۗ وَٱتَّبَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مَآ أُتْرِفُوا۟ فِيهِ وَكَانُوا۟ مُجْرِمِينَ
verses.english: So why were there not among the generations before you those of enduring discrimination forbidding corruption on earth - except a few of those We saved from among them? But those who wronged pursued what luxury they were given therein, and they were criminals.
verses.hausa: To, don me mãsu hankali ba su kasance daga mutãnen ƙarnõnin da suke a gabãninku ba, sunã hani daga ɓarna a cikin ƙasa? fãce kaɗan daga wanda Muka kuɓutar daga gare su (sun yi hanin). Kuma waɗanda suka yi zãlunci suka bin abin da aka ni'imtar da su a cikinsa, suka kasance mãsu laifi.

verses.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ لِيُهْلِكَ ٱلْقُرَىٰ بِظُلْمٍ وَأَهْلُهَا مُصْلِحُونَ
verses.english: And your Lord would not have destroyed the cities unjustly while their people were reformers.
verses.hausa: Kuma Ubangijinka bai kasance Yanã halakar da alƙaryu sabõda wani zãlunci ba, alhãli mutãnensu sunã mãsu gyãrãwa.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّاسَ أُمَّةً وَٰحِدَةً ۖ وَلَا يَزَالُونَ مُخْتَلِفِينَ
verses.english: And if your Lord had willed, He could have made mankind one community; but they will not cease to differ.
verses.hausa: Kuma dã Ubangijinka Ya so, dã Yã sanya mutãne al'umma guda. Kuma bã zã su gushe ba sunã mãsu sãɓã wa jũna.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ رَبُّكَ ۚ وَلِذَٰلِكَ خَلَقَهُمْ ۗ وَتَمَّتْ كَلِمَةُ رَبِّكَ لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.english: Except whom your Lord has given mercy, and for that He created them. But the word of your Lord is to be fulfilled that, "I will surely fill Hell with jinn and men all together."
verses.hausa: Sai wanda Ubangijinka Ya yi wa rahama, kuma dõmin wannan ne Ya halicce su. Kuma kalmar "Ubangijinka" Lalle ne zã Ni cika Jahannama da aljannu da mutãne gaba ɗaya" ta cika.

verses.arabic: وَكُلًّا نَّقُصُّ عَلَيْكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلرُّسُلِ مَا نُثَبِّتُ بِهِۦ فُؤَادَكَ ۚ وَجَآءَكَ فِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْحَقُّ وَمَوْعِظَةٌ وَذِكْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: And each [story] We relate to you from the news of the messengers is that by which We make firm your heart. And there has come to you, in this, the truth and an instruction and a reminder for the believers.
verses.hausa: Kuma dũbi dai Munã bã da lãbãri a gare ka daga lãbarun Manzanni, abin da Muke tabbatar da zuciyarka da shi. Kuma gaskiya ta zo maka a cikin wannan da wa'azi da tunãtarwã ga mãsu ĩmãni.

verses.arabic: وَقُل لِّلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِنَّا عَـٰمِلُونَ
verses.english: And say to those who do not believe, "Work according to your position; indeed, we are working.
verses.hausa: kuma kace wa waɗanda bã su yin ĩmãni, "Ku yi aiki a kan hãlinku, lalle mũ mãsu aiki ne.

verses.arabic: وَٱنتَظِرُوٓا۟ إِنَّا مُنتَظِرُونَ
verses.english: And wait, indeed, we are waiting."
verses.hausa: "Kuma ku yi Jiran dãko, lalle mu mãsu Jiran dãko ne."

verses.arabic: وَلِلَّهِ غَيْبُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ يُرْجَعُ ٱلْأَمْرُ كُلُّهُۥ فَٱعْبُدْهُ وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَيْهِ ۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَـٰفِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: And to Allah belong the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth and to Him will be returned the matter, all of it, so worship Him and rely upon Him. And your Lord is not unaware of that which you do.
verses.hausa: Kuma ga Allah gaibin sammai da ƙasa yake. Kuma zuwa gare Shi ake mayar da dukan al'amari. Sabõda haka ku bauta Masa kuma ku dõgara a kanSa. Kuma Ubangijinka bai zama Mai gafala daga abin da kuke aikatãwa ba.
